title: SimCity-DRMLESS-Beta-Update-1.5-To-1.6
description:
Install Notes
 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 1. Unpack this release and overwrite files in the root folder

  .------------------------------------------.
--|   SimCity DRMLESS Serer by Vulpes Zedra  |---
  `------------------------------------------'

version 1.6, 2013-08-04
------------------------
- Fixing sandbox mode
- Adding two new regions, Reflection & WhiteWater Valley
- Fixing some region and city naming bugs
- Fixing some loading bugs
- Fixing some other minor bugs

version 1.5, 2013-06-14
------------------------
- Fixing the v1.4 saving issue

version 1.4, 2013-06-13
------------------------
- Fixing some 32bits and non NT license issues
- Abandon cities & regions is fixed
- Renaming cities is fixed
- Fixing some minor bugs & improvements

version 1.3, 2013-06-10
------------------------
- Fixing Window 8 and some others license issues
- Adding a check for spaces in root folder name
- Fixing the dummy certificate check in some cases

version 1.2, 2013-06-07
------------------------
- Updating Start.exe so windows does not flagged it as not responding
- Getting rid of Stop.exe and Stop.bat
- Add a start/stop feature within the Start.exe file
- Add some features to check if the private server is running well (ports, processes, hosts, db...)

version 1.1, 2013-06-06
------------------------
- Getting rid of stunnel
- Replacing the Stop.exe by Stop.bat


version 1.0, 2013-06-04
------------------------
- Beta release
